title: Reducing USF rewards while on Olympus Pro waiting list
body:
Reducing USF rewards while on Olympus Pro waiting list

Due to huge demand of Olympus Pro, $USF is currently on the waitlist, and it will take some more time until it’s live. This proposal is aimed at reducing LP emissions during the waiting time.

The Rewards are currently as follows:

Uniswap LPs 200k USF (epoch rewards + bonus)
This proposal aims to either:

Reduce the Uni LPs rewards by 30% from 200k USF to 140k USF
Reduce the Uni LPs rewards by 50% from 200k USF to 100k USF
If approved, this proposal will be starting from epoch 22 (tokens vesting during epoch 23).

Option1: Reduce 30%
Option 2: Reduce 50%
Option 3: Do nothing
author: 0xa848b020CBb3e26C99C901115ea68D6741DE4BC6
